Description.Text:
Position Hotel Corona is situated in Milano Marittima near to the Beach.
Restaurant Air-conditioned Restaurant.
More Informations Last refurbishment: completely in 2008. Breakfast with salty and sweet buffet. Dinner with 3/4 menu choises, mixed buffet, fruit or dessert. Credit cards accepted: Eurocard/Mastercard and Visa. Outdoor swimming pool open from 08/06/13 al 07/09/13 from 9 a.m to 12 (midday) and from 3 p.m. to 6 p.m. Periodic adult activities from 25/5 to 15/9/13: theme evenings, Karaoke, Piano Bar and Dancing nights.
Mini Club in hotel from 25/5 to 15/9/13 during mornings and afternoons for babies from 3 years old. All inclusive prices include: unlimited drinks during meals (water, wine, bier, cola and orangeade), beach service with 1 sun ombrella and 2 sunbeds per room (double single use 1 sun ombrella + 1 sunbed), for littler babies meat broths, vegetable broths and soups, pediatric consultation service at the hotel free on request,snack for the kids in the hotel from 4 p.m. to 5:30 p.m. with salty and sweet snacks, good night buffet in hotel from 10 p.m. to 12 (midnight) with chamomile tea, tea, hot milk and cookies.
Check in from 01:00 pm and check out within 10:00 am.
